```{r}
library(htmltab)
library(stringr) 
library(readr) 

link = "https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/resources/the-world-factbook/fields/343.html"
linkpath = '//*[@id="fieldListing"]'

prueba = htmltab(doc = link, which =linkpath)

#Promedio total
prueba$total = str_split(string = prueba$`Median age`,
                         pattern = 'yearsmale',
                        simplify = T)[,1]
prueba$total = parse_number(prueba$total)

summary(prueba$total)

media =31.55
maximo = 55.40
minimo = 14.80

```
